app_limited_access: the BÍN-kjarninn app has access to a limited number of words and inflections.
word_set_text: The word set in BÍN-kjarninn app is a subset of the words available on the BÍN webpage. This simplified word set is called the BÍN-core.
is_appropriate: The BÍN-kjarninn app word set is appropriate for those who are learning Icelandic. The results in the BÍN-kjarninn app are accessed via the published API to the BÍN-core database.
